name: Lumi likes it THICC!
description: A thick Oreo Milkshake!  Most of the recipe is pretty straight forward, the vanilla custard cheesecake is a cream cheese icing.  Devon cream has a lovely chocolate note, so it adds to the chocolate and milk notes.  White chocolate adds a nice meltyness to the chocolate as well.
author: Freshepies

reviews.text: Subbed RF c&c for RF deep fried c&c, everything about this recipe is delicious and addicting

This is an amazing recipe. Iâ€™ve https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/176309#oreo_banana_cream_milkshake_by_bigred also have used part of this as a Oreo cream ice cream for a oreo cream ice cream base. i actually used that and made my recipe before I even tried this one . Check it out .
